title: Simplify STIG compliance checks with the new Database Security Assessment Tool (DBSAT) version 4.0
text: We’re thrilled to introduce DBSAT 4.0, a major leap forward in database security assessment. With DBSAT 4.0, you get expanded checks, support for the latest STIG standards, faster answers, tighter controls, and built-in references to Oracle’s latest security documentation.   You can now quickly spot vulnerabilities, understand exactly what needs attention, and get actionable recommendations every step of the way.
